title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the AI Construction Planner system, including stakeholder needs, project constraints, expected functionalities (with specific use cases), performance requirements (e.g., response time, throughput), scalability requirements (e.g., handling large datasets, managing multiple projects concurrently), security requirements (e.g., data privacy, access control, potential threats and mitigation strategies), maintainability requirements, and integration with existing construction management systems. Engage relevant stakeholders (construction managers, project planners, resource managers) to capture their specific needs, constraints, and preferences. Document any potential challenges or limitations that may impact the project's success, and propose possible solutions or workarounds. If necessary, collaborate with the technical writer to create a comprehensive documentation of the system requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and integration points, considering scalability, performance, and maintainability.

title: Implement AI Planning and Optimization Algorithms
description: Develop the core AI algorithms for construction project planning, resource allocation, and scheduling optimization, considering real-time adaptation and unforeseen circumstances.

title: Build User Interface and Visualization Components
description: Design and implement the user interface and data visualization components for construction project management, including interactive dashboards and reporting tools.

title: Integrate with Construction Project Management Systems
description: Develop integrations with existing construction project management systems, enabling data exchange and seamless workflow integration.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management components, including databases, caching mechanisms, and data access layers.

title: Establish Security and Access Control Measures
description: Implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption, to ensure system integrity and protect sensitive project information.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment Pipeline
description: Establish a robust CI/CD pipeline for automated build, testing, and deployment processes, ensuring efficient and reliable system updates.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Strategy
description: Create a testing strategy that covers unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, and user acceptance tests, ensuring the system's reliability and quality.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation, including guides, tutorials, and training materials, to facilitate system adoption and effective use.
dependencies: Build User Interface and Visualization Components
